title: The cybersecurity threat facing SMBs
description: A survey of more than 1,400 IT professionals across these SMBs revealed that 88% of respondents experienced cybersecurity incidents in the past 12 months, while about 79% are concerned about ransomware attacks impacting them. Moreover, 96% respondents said they would pay the attackers if an attack takes place.
content: Cyberattacks against small and medium businesses (SMBs), especially in India, continued to grow in 2024. Globally, SMBsfaced more than 559 million attacks between April and June 2024. A survey of more than 1,400 IT professionals across these SMBs revealed that 88% of respondents experienced cybersecurity incidents in the past 12 months, while about 79% are concerned about ransomware attacks impacting them.Moreover, 96% respondents said they would pay the attackers if an attack takes place.
